Up for sale:

1912 Recruit Marsans SGC 50

As you can see from the scan there is a long scratch on the holder (bottom left)
That would be the work of the brilliant me trying to cut the tape around the packaging done by SGC when it first arrived in the mail.  The scissors slipped and the rest is history.
Sorry for those who hate scratches on their holders but remember it's only $5.00 to get a new one.

$260.00 DLVD or best offer
Please email me @ [url]mannybb24@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks Steve
